monster.name: Crocodile

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't bite another target

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 320, Hoard of the Dragon Queen, Princes of the Apocalypse, Tomb of Annihilation, Ghosts of Saltmarsh, Essentials Kit: Dragon of Icespire Peak, Essentials Kit: Storm Lord's Wrath, Infernal Machine Rebuild, Explorer's Guide to Wildemount
